name: Fujiko F. Fujio Characters: Great Assembly! Slightly Fantastic Slapstick Party
name_original: Fujiko F. Fujio Characters: Great Assembly! Slightly Fantastic Slapstick Party
description:
Fujiko F. Fujio Characters: Great Assembly! Slightly Fantastic Slapstick Party is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 20-11-2014. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Fujiko F. Fujio Characters: Great Assembly! Slightly Fantastic Slapstick Party is available on Wii U and Nintendo 3DS.
